author: Jarrod Lucas
title: Meet Covid, the rescue dog and 'mate in isolation'
description: As Australian researchers monitor veterinary clinics across the country for any sign of COVID-19 in domestic animals, like dogs and cats, Bernie Williams has no qualms about calling to his dog — despite its name.
content:
Updated 
April 11, 2020 08:58:51
When Bernie Williams calls to his new adopted dog, he admits it raises a few eyebrows.
Key points:
